nodes.text: Longwind was a planet located in the Trax sector of the Mid Rim.

This planet was originally settled by criminals who had been released after serving their sentences in the prisons of the Old Republic, some 75 years before the Battle of Yavin. The planet emerged as the textile center of the Trax sector, and a thriving agricultural system also contributed to its economy. The Alliance established an alternate command base on Longwind during the Galactic Civil War.
